titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain National Park Service land in Fairfax County, Virginia, to the Friends of the Claude Moore Farm.
Claude Moore Farm Land Conveyance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 18 - 14.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-1053.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 820.
